messages.subject: Re: Desparately Seeking Unschoolers in Michigan
messages.msgSnippet: ... I really do!  There is a great group of eclectic homeschoolers that meets weekly.  Many of them are unschoolers.  I know of one that is an atheist and
messages.messageBody:
--- In Unschooling-dotcom@y..., "toads1and2" <shaffert@m...> wrote:
> Preferably in the Greater Lansing Area. Know Any? Caroline

I really do! There is a great group of eclectic homeschoolers that
meets weekly. Many of them are unschoolers. I know of one that is
an atheist and another that is a bhuddist. Most of them are
vegetarian. It is a great group that I miss desperately. If you
are insterested, I will call my friend in Michigan and ask how you
can contact the group.

Alaura

messages.subject: Desparately Seeking Unschoolers in Michigan
messages.msgSnippet: Preferably in the Greater Lansing Area.  Know Any?  Caroline
messages.messageBody: Preferably in the Greater Lansing Area. Know Any? Caroline
